item.description:
Happy New Year Everyone!!!! I hope everyone had a wonderful holiday season. We're ready to get back into the regular monthly meetups.

We'll hold our next meetup on Sunday, February 7th from 11am to 1pm. First timers, please check in at the front desk. We will need to see proof of updated vaccines for rabies, distemper and canine cough.

If anyone would like to schedule a bath for after the meetup, please let me know.

Velvet and I are looking forward to seeing all of you again.

Oh!!!.... and check out our blog!!! We'll be posting pictures and such about the meetups.
www.bestfriendswkf.blogspot.com

Agni
item.name: FEBRUARY MEET UP
